attributes.action: Give the Homeless Hotels and Food Assistance
attributes.additional_details:
What we are asking for
We demand that local and national leaders take immediate action to:
	1.	Provide temporary housing in hotels or suitable facilities for homeless individuals and families.
	2.	Guarantee access to meals, clean water, and hygiene essentials for all homeless residents.
	3.	Ensure fairness in support programs so that every vulnerable person, regardless of background, receives the dignity, safety, and care they deserve.
attributes.background: thousands of people in england are living on the streets without safe shelter, food, or basic necessities. While government support has been given to illegal immigrates arriving, our own homeless population many of whom are veterans, families, and vulnerable individuals are being left behind.

departments.name: Department for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities
